thread.section_title: SJF Material Handling Inc. Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SJF Material Handling Inc. | sjf.com
thread.title: Craig Lindsay
thread.title_full: SJF Material Handling Inc. reviewed by Craig Lindsay

author: Craig Lindsay
title: Craig Lindsay
text: The folks at SJF were quick to provide the needed information. Notification of the completion of the order was timely. We opted to pick up our order and had no problems getting in, loaded and out quickly. Overall, a good experience. SJF has helped us on more than one occasion and each time was pretty much hassle free.
